hopobject.name: U-Boot V2
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.1.8) Gecko/20100202 Firefox/3.5.8
hopobject.body:
U-Boot V2 is now known as Barebox.

The previous home page is at http://www.pengutronix.de/software/u-boot/v2/index_en.html

is the attempt to re-create U-Boot (V1) functionality on a new, clean code base. It is supposed to be much smaller (binary size) than U-Boot V1 and might replace X-Loader as 2nd stage boot loader. Some basic BeagleBoard support is already available in U-Boot V2 git

http://git.denx.de/?p=u-boot/u-boot-v2.git;a=summary
hopobject.shortdesc: Add BeagleBoard support to U-Boot V2 and use it as X-loader replacement
